actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against the tax imposed on interest on savings.

summary.text: Allows an income tax credit of up to $1000, under the Internal Revenue Code, for dividends or interest on savings accounts in banks, savings and loan associations, and credit unions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit against the tax imposed on interest on savings.
